name: Window Hopping
description:
Oh no! window-hopping.exe has fractured into two separate windows! The game is reflected in the second window, but only half of the platforms are visible on either. Divide your attention between the windows to hop as high as you can! Created for Mini Jam 121 based on the theme "Reflection" and with the limitation "Windows as a Mechanic". Leave a rating here: https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-121-reflection/rate/1827922

CONTROLS

MOVE: A/D or Left/Right Arrow Keys
START GAME: Space
CHANGE DIFFICULTY: E
TOGGLE TUTORIAL: T
